NameInCN: 脑膜黑色素细胞增生症
definitionCn: 柔体中的均匀痣多角形细胞的弥散性或多重增殖。 细胞可能蔓延到Virchow-Robin空间中,而不会直接入侵大脑。 即使没有组织学恶性肿瘤,弥漫性黑素细胞增多症的预后也很差。
definitionEn: A diffuse or multifocal proliferation of uniform nevoid polygonal cells in the leptomeninges. Cells may spread into the Virchow-Robin spaces without frank invasion of the brain. Diffuse melanocytosis carries a poor progNOSis even in the absence of histologic malignancy.
DifferentialDiagnosis: On CT hyperdensity within sulci on CT can mimic subarachnoid haemorrhage.In addition to leptomeningeal dissemination or more aggressive primary or secondary melanocytic tumours of the CNS, leptomeningeal carcinomatosis, meningitis and even diffuse leptomeningeal glioneuronal tumour should be considered.
